name: Voidwalker
description: Manipulate the raw power of the Void to devastate your enemies and bolster your allies.
keyFeatures: Hurls a giant ball of Void energy that damages combatants using Nova Bomb
Teleports around the battlefield and damages nearby combatants with Nova Warp
Devour ability to regenerate health on kills
Void Soul companion for debuffing enemies
playstyle: Aggressive damage dealer with self-sustain capabilities

name: Sunsinger
description: Channel Solar Light to support your allies and cheat death itself.
keyFeatures: Manipulates Solar energy to support allies through Radiance
Brings the wielder back from death with self-resurrection
Supercharges ability regeneration for team support
Grants enhanced grenade and melee spam during super
playstyle: Support and survivability with clutch resurrection potential

name: Dawnblade
description: Forge Solar Light into devastating weapons and healing sanctuaries.
keyFeatures: Summons a flaming sword that damages combatants with projectiles
Creates healing pools that buff allies with Well of Radiance
Enhanced aerial combat and mobility
Support-focused Solar abilities
playstyle: Versatile Solar caster with support and DPS options

name: Stormcaller
description: Harmony within, hurricane without. Become the storm.
keyFeatures: Channels and chains lightning using Stormtrance
Conjures a concentrated beam of Arc energy with Chaos Reach
Arc Soul companion for additional damage
Ionic Traces for ability regeneration
playstyle: Roaming lightning wielder with sustained damage options

name: Shadebinder
description: Freeze your enemies in their tracks and shatter them to pieces.
keyFeatures: Summons a Stasis staff to instantly freeze enemies
Detonates frozen enemies to shatter on command
Creates Stasis turrets for area control
Iceflare Bolts for chain freezing
playstyle: Crowd control specialist with freeze and shatter mechanics

name: Broodweaver
description: Weave the threads of reality into minions to fight by your side.
keyFeatures: Spawns missiles that explode and unleash Threadlings
Creates Threadling allies to attack enemies automatically
Grapple for enhanced mobility
Tangles for area denial and damage
playstyle: Summoner with swarm tactics and minion management

name: Prismatic Warlock
description: Combine the power of Light and Darkness into one devastating arsenal.
keyFeatures: Combines both Light and Darkness abilities
Uses Transcendence for increased weapon damage
Enhanced ability regeneration during Transcendence
Access to Prismatic-exclusive Grenade
playstyle: Hybrid class mixing multiple elemental powers

name: Striker
description: At close quarters, a fist is better than any gun.
keyFeatures: Charges Arc energy to slam into the ground with devastating force
Becomes a missile to deal massive single-target damage
Frontal shield while sprinting with Juggernaut
Enhanced melee damage after breaking shields
playstyle: Aggressive close-quarters combat with powerful melee

name: Defender
description: The wall against which the Darkness breaks.
keyFeatures: Creates a protective bubble that buffs and protects allies
Grants Weapons of Light buff for increased damage
Overshield generation for team protection
Defensive anchor for team play
playstyle: Defensive support with team buffs and protection

name: Sentinel
description: Forge Void Light into an indestructible shield.
keyFeatures: Summons a glowing Void shield for offense and defense
Can throw shield as projectile or use for melee
Buffs nearby allies with shield blocking
Creates Void axes that can be used by allies
playstyle: Versatile Void defender with offense and support options

name: Sunbreaker
description: Forge the fury of undying suns.
keyFeatures: Summons a Solar hammer to throw at enemies
Creates Sunspots for area control and healing
Wields a massive flaming maul for melee combat
Solar ability kills restore health
playstyle: Solar warrior with area denial and self-sustain

name: Behemoth
description: Become the avalanche. Crush your enemies beneath glacial might.
keyFeatures: Summons a glove to spawn Stasis crystals
Ground-pound attacks that freeze enemies
Creates defensive crystal walls
Shatters crystals for massive damage
playstyle: Aggressive Stasis tank with crystal manipulation

name: Berserker
description: Tear through your enemies with vicious Strand claws.
keyFeatures: Summons Strand claws to sever and suspend enemies
Creates Woven Mail for damage resistance
Destroys Tangles for ability energy
Strand whip that suspends targets
playstyle: Aggressive Strand melee combatant with sustainability

name: Prismatic Titan
description: Combine the power of Light and Darkness into an unstoppable force.
keyFeatures: Combines both Light and Darkness abilities
Uses Transcendence for increased weapon damage
Enhanced ability regeneration during Transcendence
Access to Prismatic-exclusive Grenade
playstyle: Hybrid tank mixing multiple elemental powers

name: Gunslinger
description: A lone wolf who lives for the perfect shot.
keyFeatures: Summons a flaming hand cannon for massive precision damage
Conjures explosive knives for area damage
Precision kills extend super duration
Creates ignitions for explosive Solar damage
playstyle: Precision damage dealer with explosive potential

name: Bladedancer
description: Beautiful lethality, relentless style.
keyFeatures: Summons Arc knives for rapid melee combat
Enhanced invisibility mechanics
Fast-paced close-quarters combat
Arc damage chains to nearby enemies
playstyle: Stealth assassin with rapid melee strikes

name: Arcstrider
description: Flow like lightning. Strike like thunder.
keyFeatures: Summons a B≈ç staff for electrocuting enemies
Can deflect projectiles with staff
Throws staff as spear for area control
Blink teleport strikes with Storm's Edge
playstyle: Mobile Arc warrior with staff combat mastery

name: Nightstalker
description: Stalk the battlefield. Strike from the shadows.
keyFeatures: Spreads Void anchors to slow and suppress enemies
Tethers enemies making them vulnerable
Enhanced invisibility and stealth mechanics
Summons Void blades with invisibility
playstyle: Stealth support with debuffs and crowd control

name: Revenant
description: Embrace the cold. Become the storm.
keyFeatures: Summons and throws Stasis kamas
Creates a freezing tornado for area denial
Slows, freezes, and shatters enemies
Enhanced Stasis shard generation
playstyle: Stasis assassin with area control

name: Threadrunner
description: Weave the threads of fate. Strike with precision.
keyFeatures: Summons a Strand rope dart for whipping combatants
Infinite grapples during super
Jab and spin attacks with rope dart
Enhanced mobility with grapple mechanics
playstyle: Mobile Strand combatant with grapple mastery

name: Prismatic Hunter
description: Combine the power of Light and Darkness into the perfect arsenal.
keyFeatures: Combines both Light and Darkness abilities
Uses Transcendence for increased weapon damage
Enhanced ability regeneration during Transcendence
Access to Prismatic-exclusive Grenade
playstyle: Versatile hybrid mixing multiple elemental powers
